original_text: and will go out to deceive the nations in the four corners of the earth—Gog and Magog—and to gather them for battle. In number they are like the sand on the seashore.
korean_text: 나와서 땅의 사방 백성 곧 곡과 마곡을 미혹하고 모아 싸움을 붙이리니 그 수가 바다의 모래 같으리라

sentences.original_text: and will go out to deceive the nations
in the four corners of the earth
and to gather them for battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 전쟁을 위해 그들을 모으기 위해

sentences.original_text: In number they are like the sand
